title: GT 4.0.7 Incremental Release Notes: Dynamic Accounts

section.title: Introduction
section.para: These release notes are for the incremental release 4.0.7. It includes a summary of changes since 4.0.6, bug fixes since 4.0.6 and any known problems that still exist at the time of the 4.0.7 release. This page is in addition to the top-level 4.0.7 release notes at http://www.globus.org/toolkit/releasenotes/4.0.7.

note.para: The name of this component has been updated to Dynamic Accounts from Workspace Management Services (WMS).

section.para: For release notes about 4.0 (including feature summary, technology dependencies, etc) go to the WMS 4.0 Release Notes.

section.title: For More Information
section.para: Click here for more information about this component.
